unnormalised: Arre yaar, pesticide usage is a tricky topic! My grandfather in Punjab used them liberally back in 1980s. Now, everyone's talking organic! Saw a farmer in Kerala struggling with pests near Kottayam, 20/07/2023. Remember reading about NISARD's report on effects, dated 10/10/2022 at 14:00 hrs. Rs. 5000 gone in pesticides sometimes! Need sustainable methods, like yesterday, i.e. 01/01/2024. Jay Jawan Jay Kisan!
normalised: Arre yaar, pesticide usage is a tricky topic! My grandfather in Punjab used them liberally back in nineteen eighties. Now, everyone's talking organic! Saw a farmer in Kerala struggling with pests near Kottayam, twentieth july two thousand and twenty three. Remember reading about N I S A R D's report on effects, dated tenth october two thousand and twenty two at two P M. Rupee five thousand gone in pesticides sometimes! Need sustainable methods, like yesterday, that is first january two thousand and twenty four. Jay Jawan Jay Kisan!
